content: शोभन {%<ab>a.</ab>%} (नी|{%<ab>f.</ab>%}) [शोभते शुभू-ल्यु] {@--1@} Shining, splendid. {@--2@} Handsome, beautiful, lovely. {@--3@} Good, auspicious, fortunate. {@--4@} Richly decorated. {@--5@} Moral, virtuous. --नः {@--1@} <ab>N.</ab> of Śiva. {@--2@} A planet. {@--3@} A burnt offering for the production of happy results. --ना {@--1@} Turmeric. {@--2@} A beautiful or virtuous woman; तदिदं परिरक्ष शोभने भवितव्यप्रियसंगमं वपुः <ls>Ku. 4. 44.</ls> {@--3@} A sort of yellow pigment (= गोरोचना <ab>q. v.</ab>). --नं {@--1@} Beauty, lustre, brilliance. {@--2@} A lotus.
